catalog_info.title: Reading and Research
catalog_info.notes: Limited to candidates for the PhD who are in residence, who have been for a year in residence, and who are in good standing in the Graduate School. May ordinarily be taken only in preparation for a field (or fields) to be examined on the General Examination. May not be counted toward the AM degree except by permission of the Department.
catalog_info.description: Instructors listed above under History 3010 supervise individual work in preparation for the General Examination for the PhD degree.
